name: fwh-cli-agent
description: Monitors CLI.md, parses prompts from ## Prompts, and runs them in a new Cursor agent (Composer or agent CLI).

fwhCliAgent.cliMdPath.description: Path to CLI.md relative to workspace root. Used when cli-agent.json CliAgent.CliMdPath is not set.

fwhCliAgent.executeMode.description: How to run the prompt: 'composer' opens Cursor Composer and copies the prompt to clipboard; 'agent-cli' runs `agent -p "..."` in a new terminal.

fwhCliAgent.composerCommand.description: Command ID to open Cursor Composer when executeMode is 'composer'. Cursor may use 'composer.new' or 'aichat.new'.

fwhCliAgent.debug.description: When true, write verbose debug lines to the Cursor CLI output channel. CR-EXT-1.4.3.

commands.title: FWH CLI Agent: Run prompt from CLI.md
FWH CLI Agent: Process CLI.md now
FWH CLI Agent: Show Cursor CLI output
